name: Elgato Stream Deck +
description: Advanced Stream Deck with 8 LCD keys, 4 rotary dials, and touch strip. Perfect for audio mixing, video switching, and creative workflows beyond streaming.

reviews.review_text: Dials for audio mixing is brilliant. Podcast workflow transformed.
Touch strip takes getting used to but useful once learned.
Fewer keys than XL but dials make up for it.
